idea:
focuses on providing Technical Solutions and Services. Since its inception in 2018, Prudent Group has strived to provide Precocious Integrated Security Solutions to Client. Our solutions are Customized as per the Requirements of the client as well as enabling our clients to meet Present and Future Technological Requirements.

To focus majorly on ELV Projects and Create a strong foothold on this Sector, Effective October 1st 2018, PRUDENT TEQTIS was formed with the Trust, Experience and Expertise of the Team members.

We build Connected Security Systems and Solutions which help improve Buildings, Projects, Factories, etc Creating a Safer, Productive and more Comfortable Environment. Our Integrated Solutions are made for Businesses of every Size & Type.

We have maintained strong and mutually beneficial relationships with our key suppliers over the years which helps us to provide excellent products and services to our client. We have empanelled more than 200 Vendors and Suppliers enabling us to provide need based Solutions to our Customers.

We Understand Complex Facilities and Projects and Create High Quality and High Performance deliverables as per the requirement and needs of the client. We are committed to the highest standards in what we do and commit ourselves to each task with utmost responsibility. Prudent Teqtis’ In-House expertise reduces Financial Risk; avoids Transferring Risk to Outsourced Vendors. Early Collaboration between design and construction teams leads to cost effective, constructible Solutions; and fewer changes in overall design.
name: PRUDENT TEQTIS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
INTRODUCTION LETTER


ArgOnKiln Services is an Indian company based in Mumbai. Our experienced and seasoned team professionals truly understand what modern customer’s needs are and the sole purpose of starting this organization is to try and meet customer’s expectations in a timely manner with no compromise on Quality, thereby ensuring Reliability.


We believe,


“ArgOnKiln Services will be your Partner in maintaining your

Rotary Kiln TROUBLE FREE”


ArgOnKiln Services Team takes great pride to be an Indian company with No Affiliations to any OEM’s, thereby ensuring our services and results are unbiased, timely and result oriented.


Our Team has performed survey’s and worked on Rotary Kiln of almost all major OEM’s such as:

 FLSmidth  Promac Engineering  Metso

 KHD Humboldt Wedag  Sinoma  Lurgi

 Thyssenkrupp Polysius  Walchandnagar Industries  Allis-Chalmers

 UBE & IHI (Japan)  Kilburn Engineering  Chanderpur Works


Safety and Quality is our number one priority.


ArgOnKiln Services team is equipped with most accurate, precise & calibrated tools, embracing new technology whilst including positives into it from the past.


Our team also helps customers to identify, investigate, document and eliminate issues related to inferior quality and/or substandard engineered parts, the reason customers trust us for doing an independent survey, especially immediately after their rotary kiln is commissioned.


ArgOnKiln Team offers the following services:

 Hot Alignment Analysis.

 Cold Alignment Analysis.

 Support Roller Adjustments & Axial Balancing to stabilize kiln axial floating.

 Visual Walk by Inspection & Audits.

 Repairs and Replacements on Turnkey basis.

 Expert Supervision and assistance to reduce repairs / replacements cost.

 In-Situ Grinding (Resurfacing) of Tyres and Rollers.

 Engineering Study of Rotary Kiln.


ArgOnKiln Team offers the following supplies:

 MigraBar - Best lubricating bar for Kiln Tyre bore & Chair-pads.

 Graphite Blocks - Dry lubricant for Tyres, Support rollers, Kiln Seals etc.

 Lamella Seal Plates - SS301 fully hardened, SS 304 as per client requirement.

 Kiln Seals - Inlet & Outlet Kiln Lamella / Graphite Seals

 Tyre & Support Roller

 Girth Gear, Pinion, Spring Plates

 Customised Free Floating Chair-pads

 Shell Sections

 Journal Bearing for Support Roller, Pinion etc.

 Online Monitoring system for Girth Gear Run-out.


Thank you for investing your time to go through all what we can offer, and ArgOnKiln Services Team fervently hopes to serve and be your Partner in maintaining your Rotary Kiln trouble free with improved reliability.


You can always reach out to below mentioned ArgOnKiln Team members in case of any queries or clarifications:


Mr. Jayeshkumar 

9152222519

9699998185
name: ARGONKILN SERVICES LLP

idea: OriginConnect brings to you, a simple efficient mechanism of sourcing Farm Fresh Vegetables directly from the Origin. We optimize the Agri Chain, bringing in Value addition at each step..

idea: Indusverse Publisher Private Limited believes that in the age of Online Entertainment, Stories play a very important part and visual storytelling has the largest share of that. Comic Books are the oldest form of visual storytelling and are the foundation of everything from Videos to games to movies and what not. Case in example, Marvel- The comic book company of Disney is one of the largest companies in the business of comic book and character led storytelling and is valued in tens of billions of Dollars. Indusverse, want to create hundreds of stories and characters which are India Centric and are confident to become the Marvel of India. They are starting with their physical and digital books, and are planning to soon create different forms of storytelling using their comic books. They have already received great reviews from some of the biggest comic books creators in the world like Mark Millar and are already becoming popular among the younger consumers of Internet content. They have already become a popular brand amongst the Indian comic book industry, with bagging 4 awards in India's biggest comic books awards by ComicCon India. With growth of Online content all over the world especially after Pandemic, the users want to consume more and more diverse forms of content and stories and that is a big market given the population of India.
name: INDUSVERSE PUBLISHERS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Aurus Technologies owns and operates the EduGrow Learning app. We're a young company focusing on providing high quality education to the bottom of the pyramid markets across the world. We aim to capitalise on the widespread learning that the education technology industry in India has gained to create high quality content for self learning.
name: Aurus Technologies

idea: ToolTip Technology is an IT Company. we provide IT Service like Hardware and Software Installation, Antivirus Service, Malware Removal,  Website Service,  Application Service, Laptop and Desktop Repairing, Second-Hand Laptop,  Brand New Laptop,  Pan card Services,  Adar Card Services, Operating System Installation and many more services.

idea: BIND; is a bridging gap between the businesses conducted from home and consumers looking for affordable yet quality goods/services in their vicinity. It is a user-friendly application which helps connect/interact with entrepreneurs and businesses that are carried out from home to the users looking to purchase those goods/services. We are looking to serve the home-grown businesses that have competency and expertise in their chosen field but all they lack is: strong and efficient connectivity. BIND empowers its users, in the areas of different knowledge, skills, fields or industry, who will support or provide a solution to the inquirers, seeking to hire these services as they get assisted with the businesses in their close proximity and with exactly what they are looking for!
name: BIND INTERACTIVE LLP
